amendment.description: To impose a criminal penalty for unauthorized recording or distribution of images produced using advanced imaging technology during screenings of individuals at airports and upon entry to Federal buildings.

vote.text: Amendment SA 58 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 16.

action.text: Amendment SA 58 proposed by Senator Nelson NE. (consideration: CR S624-625; text: CR S624-625) To impose a criminal penalty for unauthorized recording or distribution of images produced using advanced imaging technology during screenings of individuals at airports and upon entry to Federal buildings.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 58 proposed by Senator Nelson NE.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 58 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 98 - 0. Record Vote Number: 16.
